intro: It's a pleasure to meet you! Would you be interested in entering a merger with my flock? \|Well, my flock is just me, but you'll be getting in on the ground floor!
join: Glad to be working with you. Now, let's talk portfolio.

intro: Hahaha! It takes guts to step into The Roc's ring, kid. You know, The Roc doesn't say this to all of his fans, but The Roc thinks you might have what it takes.
join: That's the spirit! With this flock The Roc can finally take the tag-team title from the Golden Geese ... aHAHAHA!
flesh: The Roc always knew the suits had it out for him. Do your worst.
leave: After everything we've been through ... you're kicking The Roc out of his own flock? Well if you wanted a rival, you've got one now, kid.
rebel: Listen kid, The Roc's been out here a long time. Seen some things. And The Roc's got a message for you - the Resistance needs you at the Bird Down Smackdown. And The Roc's gonna help you.

intro: I'm born to win, you understand? King of the Jungle! I fly high with the best of 'em. And it just so happens that I'm in free agency, so if your flock is hiring ...
join: Yes! The might of the Precursors flows through my veins. Rex Ruler is here to conquer the world!
flesh: Woah, this wasn't in the script!
leave: Cast out of my own kingdom ... the cruelty ... the betrayal ...
rebel: Good, you're here! Look, the humans have turned our whole world into a cage match, and even if we're not gonna be on prime time, the Resistance needs your help. Us birds don't belong in cages, we belong on the THRONE!

intro: Hahaha! It takes guts to step into the champ's ring, kid. You know, I don't say this to all of my fans, but I think you might have what it takes.
join: That's the spirit! With this flock I can finally take the tag-team title from the Golden Geese ... aHAHAHA!
flesh: I always knew the suits had it out for me. Do your worst.
leave: After everything we've been through ... you're kicking me out of my own flock? Well if you wanted a rival, you've got one now, kid.
